articles.title: World Cup 2022 odds: Kylian Mbappé favorite to win Golden Boot, Golden Ball - FOX Sports
articles.description: France's Kylian Mbappé is favored to win the Golden Boot and Golden Ball. Can he do something that hasn't been accomplished since 1990? Patrick Everson breaks down the odds.
articles.content: There's much more to World Cup odds than just betting on who wins these matches or betting on the Draw, as I like to do. Just as with events American bettors are more accustomed to, the prop bet mark… [+3304 chars]
